cards.english: impoliteness, bad manners, I beg your parden/Goodbye
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsurei

sentence.kanji: ではそろそろ失礼します。
sentence.romaji: deha sorosoro shitsurei shimasu
sentence.english: Well, it's about time for me to go.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's orei

sentence.kanji: 彼女にお礼の手紙を書きました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ni orei no tegami wo kakimashita
sentence.english: I wrote her a thank you letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shain

sentence.kanji: 彼は優秀な社員です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuushuu na shain desu
sentence.english: He's an excellent employee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukujitsu

sentence.kanji: 5月3日は祝日だ。
sentence.romaji: gogatsu mika ha shukujitsu da
sentence.english: May 3rd is a holiday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oiwai

sentence.kanji: 彼の就職のお祝いをしよう。
sentence.romaji: kare no shuushoku no oiwai wo shiyou
sentence.english: Let's celebrate his new employment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keijiban

sentence.kanji: 掲示板のお知らせを見ましたか。
sentence.romaji: keijiban no oshirase wo mimashita ka
sentence.english: Did you see the notice on the bulletin board?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keisatsu

sentence.kanji: 警察を呼んでください。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu wo yonde kudasai
sentence.english: Call the police.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimesu

sentence.kanji: 彼は新製品に興味を示している。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shinseihin ni kyoumi wo shimeshite iru
sentence.english: He's showing interest in the new product.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nobiru

sentence.kanji: 髪がだいぶ伸びたね。
sentence.romaji: kami ga daibu nobita ne
sentence.english: Your hair has grown a lot, hasn't it?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okashi

sentence.kanji: みんなにお菓子をあげましょう。
sentence.romaji: minna ni okashi wo agemashou
sentence.english: Let's give everyone some sweets.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshiire

sentence.kanji: 布団を押し入れにしまいました。
sentence.romaji: futon wo oshiire ni shimaimashita
sentence.english: I put my futon in the closet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sode

sentence.kanji: このシャツは袖が短い。
sentence.romaji: kono shatsu ha sode ga mijikai
sentence.english: This shirt has short sleeves.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moushikomi

sentence.kanji: 今日、スポーツジムの申し込みをしました。
sentence.romaji: kyou supo-tsujimu no moushikomi wo shimashita
sentence.english: I signed up for the sports gym today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shakaijin

sentence.kanji: この春に彼は社会人になったよ。
sentence.romaji: kono haru ni kare ha shakaijin ni nata yo
sentence.english: He became a working adult this spring.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nyuusha

sentence.kanji: 彼は昨年入社したの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sakunen nyuusha shita no
sentence.english: He joined the company last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatashite

sentence.kanji: 果たして彼は現れるだろうか。
sentence.romaji: hatashite kare ha arawarerudarou ka
sentence.english: Will he really show up in the end?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moushiageru

sentence.kanji: 結果を申し上げます。
sentence.romaji: keka wo moushiagemasu
sentence.english: I'll announce the results.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honsha

sentence.kanji: 今日は本社で会議があります。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha honsha de kaigi ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a conference at headquarters today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinjiru

sentence.kanji: 市は昨年から歩きタバコを禁じているの。
sentence.romaji: shi ha sakunen kara arukitabako wo kinjite iru no
sentence.english: Since last year, the city has banned smoking cigarettes while walking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tachiirikinshi

sentence.kanji: ここは立ち入り禁止です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha tachiirikinshi desu
sentence.english: This is a restricted area.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shasetsu

sentence.kanji: この新聞の社説は面白いね。
sentence.romaji: kono shinbun no shasetsu ha omoshiroi ne
sentence.english: The editorial in this newspaper is interesting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saijitsu

sentence.kanji: うちの会社は祭日は休みです。
sentence.romaji: uchi no kaisha ha saijitsu ha yasumi desu
sentence.english: At our company, we get national holidays off.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatasu

sentence.kanji: 彼はしっかりと責任を果たしました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shikari to sekinin wo hatashimashita
sentence.english: He fulfilled his responsibilities diligently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shousha

sentence.kanji: 兄は商社に勤めています。
sentence.romaji: ani ha shousha ni tsutomete imasu
sentence.english: My elder brother works for a trading company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moushideru

sentence.kanji: 彼はプロジェクトへの参加を申し出たよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha purojiekuto he no sanka wo moushideta yo
sentence.english: He offered to join the project.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sagasu

sentence.kanji: 警察がその男を捜しているの。
sentence.romaji: keisatsu ga sono otoko wo sagashite iru no
sentence.english: The police are searching for the man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansatsu

sentence.kanji: 花の成長を観察して日記を書きなさい。
sentence.romaji: hana no seichou wo kansatsu shite niki wo kakinasai
sentence.english: Observe the growth of the flower and record it in your diary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kamisama

sentence.kanji: 神様にお願いしました。
sentence.romaji: kamisama ni onegai shimashita
sentence.english: I asked a favor to the gods.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shintou

sentence.kanji: 彼女の家は神道です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no ie ha shintou desu
sentence.english: Her family religion is Shinto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sekiyu

sentence.kanji: 日本は石油のほとんどを輸入しています。
sentence.romaji: nipon ha sekiyu no hotondo wo yunyuu shite imasu
sentence.english: Japan imports most of its oil.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keiji

sentence.kanji: 大会のスローガンを掲示したよ。
sentence.romaji: taikai no suro-gan wo keiji shita yo
sentence.english: I posted the rally's slogan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moushiwakenai

sentence.kanji: 彼には申し訳ないことをした。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha moushiwakenai koto wo shita
sentence.english: I did something inexcusable to him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's moushiwake

sentence.kanji: 申し訳ございません。
sentence.romaji: moushiwake gozaimasen
sentence.english: I'm very sorry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seika

sentence.kanji: 厳しい練習が良い成果に結び付きました。
sentence.romaji: kibishii renshuu ga yoi seika ni musubitsukimashita
sentence.english: Intense training leads to good results.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukushi

sentence.kanji: 姉は福祉の勉強をしています。
sentence.romaji: ane ha fukushi no benkyou wo shite imasu
sentence.english: My big sister studies welfare.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's todoke

sentence.kanji: 郵便局に引っ越しの届けを出したよ。
sentence.romaji: yuubinkyoku ni hikoshi no todoke wo dashita yo
sentence.english: I submitted the change of address notification to the post office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rei

sentence.kanji: 先生にお礼の手紙を書きました。
sentence.romaji: sensei ni orei no tegami wo kakimashita
sentence.english: I wrote a thank-you letter to my teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iwau

sentence.kanji: 家族で彼の合格を祝ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kazoku de kare no goukaku wo iwata yo
sentence.english: His whole family celebrated him having passed the exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katei

sentence.kanji: 一年生の課程を修了したの。
sentence.romaji: ichinensei no katei wo shuuryou shita no
sentence.english: He completed the first-year curriculum.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiten

sentence.kanji: 視点を変えて見てみましょう。
sentence.romaji: shiten wo kaete mite mimashou
sentence.english: Let's try to change our point of view.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nika

sentence.kanji: 犬の散歩は私の日課です。
sentence.romaji: inu no sanpo ha watashi no nika desu
sentence.english: Walking the dog is my daily routine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinshi

sentence.kanji: 交差点付近は駐車禁止です。
sentence.romaji: kousaten fukin ha chuusha kinshi desu
sentence.english: It is forbidden to park close to the intersection.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mousu

sentence.kanji: 私は鈴木と申します。
sentence.romaji: watakushi ha suzuki to moushimasu
sentence.english: My name is Suzuki.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touyu

sentence.kanji: ストーブの灯油がなくなったわよ。
sentence.romaji: suto-bu no touyu ga nakunata wa yo
sentence.english: The kerosene for the stove has run out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's reigi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は礼儀が身に付いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha reigi ga mi ni tsuite imasu
sentence.english: She's accomplished in etiquette.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fue

sentence.kanji: 彼は笛を吹くのが上手いね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha fue wo fuku no ga umai ne
sentence.english: He's good at playing the flute.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nobasu

sentence.kanji: ストレッチで筋肉を伸ばしましょう。
sentence.romaji: sutorechi de kinniku wo nobashimashou
sentence.english: Let's stretch our muscles with exercises.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iwai

sentence.kanji: 結婚のお祝いに食器を頂きました。
sentence.romaji: kekon no oiwai ni shoki wo itadakimashita
sentence.english: I received tableware as a wedding gift.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kosuru

sentence.kanji: 冷えた手を擦って温めた。
sentence.romaji: hieta te wo kosute atatameta
sentence.english: I warmed my cold hands by rubbing them.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masatsu

sentence.kanji: その二つの国に摩擦が生じたんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono futatsu no kuni ni masatsu ga shoujita n da
sentence.english: Friction arose between the two countries.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiku

sentence.kanji: この線を軸にして図形を回転してください。
sentence.romaji: kono sen wo jiku ni shite zukei wo kaiten shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please take this line as the axis and rotate the figure around it.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hadaka

sentence.kanji: 彼らは裸のつきあいをしているよ。
sentence.romaji: karera ha hadaka no tsukiai wo shite iru yo
sentence.english: They have an open relationship with each other.
